sentence.Network_en: It is forbidden to adjoin to a postcard any sample of merchandise.
sentence.Network_cn: 在明信片上附贴商品的样品是不许可的.

sentence.Network_en: Canada and Mexico adjoin the United States of America.
sentence.Network_cn: 加拿大与墨西哥临近美国.

博士英语词汇经典 - 豆丁网 ... adjacent 邻近的, 接近的 59 adjoin 邻接, 毗连 60 adjunct 附件, 助手.

list.abs: adjoining chart 邻接海图adjoining plane 接合面adjoining shoreline 邻近岸线
酒店房间分类中英文对照 ... 带厨房客房 Room with Kitchen 相邻房 Adjoining Room 朝街房 Front View Room.
酒店中常用的英文缩写 ... 蒸汽浴 STEAM BATH 邻近房 ADJOINING ROOM 付款方式 ADVANCE PAYMENT.
adit mouth 平硐口adjoining rock 围岩adjust 蝶
adjacent of window 窗棂adjoining building 邻屋adjustable ball hinge 可第球铰链

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French ajoindre, from Latin adjungere, from ad- 'to' + jungere 'to join'

encyclopedia.content: 英音：[ə'dʒɔin] 美音：[ə'dʒɔɪn] 靠近 牵连 大学英语等级考试六级高频词及物动词 vt. 贴近；毗连 I do adjoin a copy of the letter that I have received 我确实在收到的信中加了一副本。不及物动词 vi. 靠近，毗邻着 The two bedrooms adjoin. 这两间卧室毗连。

entry.def: If one room, place, or object adjoins another, they are next to each other.

example.ex: Fields adjoined the garden and there were no neighbours...
We waited in an adjoining office.
example.tran: 我们在旁边的办公室里等候。

means.word_mean: 1. lie adjacent to another or share a boundary;
2. be in direct physical contact with; make contact;

sentences.sentence: "The wire must not contact the metal cover"
"I adjoin a copy of your my lawyer's letter"

auth_sentence.content: A massy wheel,...To whose huge spokes ten thousand lesser things Are mortis'd and adjoin'd.
auth_sentence.res_content: A massy wheel,...To whose huge spokes ten thousand lesser things Are mortis'd and adjoin'd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A massy wheel,...To whose huge spokes ten thousand lesser things Are mortis'd and adjoin'd.

auth_sentence.content: They were unable to provide the community facilities planned to adjoin the 10, 000 all-seater ground.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were unable to provide the community facilities planned to adjoin the 10, 000 all-seater ground.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were unable to provide the community facilities planned to adjoin the 10, 000 all-seater ground.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补

sentences.en: The swimming pool adjoins the hotel.

jushi.english: Canada and the United States adjoin.
It's at this point that these three neighbourhoods adjoin.
jushi.chinese: 这三个街区在这一点毗连。
